name: ZoneBSD
short_description: ZoneBSD is a project to research the feasability of adapting the FreeBSD kernel to run within a Solaris 10 Zone container.  This will allow a virtualized FreeBSD to run on top of a parent Solaris 10 kernel through the Zones virtualization mechanism.
